# 2D volcano plots

```{r include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, cache = FALSE)
```

```{r include=FALSE}
# Load packages and data

source(here::here(
    "scripts",
    "0_env_prep.R"
))

source(here::here(
    "scripts",
    "4_dge_plot_volcano2d_and_ma.R"
))

list_trio <- list(
    treat_day3 = c(1, 3, 5),
    treat_day5 = c(2, 4, 6),
    days_untreat = c(7, 8, 9),
    days_treat = c(10, 11, 12),
    passage_day3 = c(13, 14, 15),
    passage_day5 = c(19, 20, 21)
)
```

## All volcano + MA plots

```{r}
walk(plots_volcano_ma, plot)
```

## Grouped plots for thesis

```{r fig.width = 8, fig.height = 8}
plots_trio <- list_trio %>%
    map(\(x) plots_volcano_ma[x]) %>%
    map(\(x) {
        plot_grid(
            plotlist = x,
            ncol = 1,
            labels = "AUTO"
        )
    })

walk(plots_trio, plot)
```
